title: No better place than India to innovate and invest in renewable energy: PM
description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi highlighted India's significant progress in the renewable energy sector, presenting it as a lucrative opportunity for investors. Speaking at the Global Renewable Energy Investors Meet and Expo, he emphasized India's commitment to 'Make in India' solutions and its potential for sustainable growth through solar, wind, nuclear, and hydro energy sources.
